meanings.definition: Actions or changes made in response to adaptations.
meanings.sent1: The counteradaptations of the animal helped it survive in a new environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the counteradaptations of plants to understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: The counteradaptations of the robot made it dance in the opposite direction.
meanings.sent4: Her clever counteradaptations to the problem impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The counteradaptations of the superhero's suit made it indestructible.

meanings.definition: The process of adapting in opposition to something else.
meanings.sent1: The counteradaptations of the team allowed them to outsmart their opponents.
meanings.sent2: In nature, we can observe various counteradaptations in different species.
meanings.sent3: The counteradaptations of the chef's recipe made it taste surprisingly unique.
meanings.sent4: His quick counteradaptations to the changing market trends saved his business.
meanings.sent5: The counteradaptations of the chameleon's camouflage were truly remarkable.
